title: Footsteps Audio SFX
description: Wide palette of footsteps recorded in natural environments like forest, meadow, grass, thickets, leafs, hay, straw, snow, ice, water, puddle, mud, road, tarmac, stones, sand, dirt, construction site, metal, steel, glass, wood, pier, wooden deck, cartoon.
longDescription:
no9 Footsteps Package gives you wide variety of natural footsteps recorded in environments like forest, meadow, muddy pathway, road, construction site etc. Sound cues are based on randomized sounds up to 250 oneshot source samples per sound cue (7475 wav files in total). Package includes also lots of prepared sounds to fit cartoon, animation characters and so on. They cover types like: 8 bit/retro, cartoon, toys-like sounds, robot walks, insect, bigger and smaller stomps and other imaginary foot noises.



Sound cues are presented in the video demo: https://youtu.be/c1uJD8RSnBw

Detailed sounds listing: http://grogon.com/no9-footsteps-package/



Main folder listing [35+ SoundCues]:

Bricks Debris Type 1, Bricks Debris Type 2, Cardboard Shreds, Debris Rubble, DR Clangorous, Dirt Road, Forest Cover, Glass Grit, Glass Grit Clinging, Glass Surface Thick, Grass, Hay Straw, Ice Crackle, Leafs Dry, Loose Pavement Tiles, Metal Scaffolding, Mud Dirt Run, Mud Dirt Walk, Sand And Gravel, Sand Run, Snow Deeper, Snow Shallow, Stones Type 1, Stones Type 2, Tarmac Soft, Thickets, Water Puddle Deep, Water Puddle Deeper, Water Puddle Shallow, Wire Fence And Bushes, Wood Old Deck Type 1, Wood Old Deck Type 2, Wood Old Deck Type 3, Other Wood Sounds Jumps/Breaking, Wood Type 1/2/3.



Cartoon And Other Footsteps subfolders [250+ SoundCues]:

Alien, Arcade 8bitish, Comic Toys, Insectoid, Metal, Other, Raspy Noises, Robots Mechs, Steps Big Stomps and more...
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • over 330 unique footstep types palette to pick from.
  • covers many natural environments like forest, bush, thickets, meadow, road, construction site, building debris, brick, mud, water, wooden deck etc. Also sound designed footstep types for cartoon/animation/retro game types. Additional noises for ice crackling and dry wood breaking and jumps.
  • 35 main footsteps types with lots of randomized variants ranging from 10 to 250 source files.
  • Double speed variants inside _x2 folder of footsteps mentioned above. It was processed and edited to fit quicker movement tempos.
  • 260 cartoon/8-bit and other footsteps that are based on two or one source variants.
  • 7475 oneshot WAV files in 250MB of total audio data.
  • 336 CUE files, each for particular footstep type, randomized and/or modulated.
  • all source sound files are rendered into 44 kHz, 16 bit format. Edited, trimmed and volume balanced.  

Number of Audio Waves: 7475

Number of Audio Cues: 336

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz / 16bit Mono WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 49

Supported Development Platforms: universal

Supported Target Build Platforms: universal

Documentation: Included in package
